channel.title: OVN, Open Virtual Network on OVN project documentation website
channel.description: Recent content in OVN, Open Virtual Network on OVN project documentation website

item.description:
OVN 25.09

OVN 25.09 was initially released on 5 September, 2025. This version of OVN is currently supported for all bug fixes. Support for this version will end on 5 September, 2026.

v25.09.1

v25.09.1 was released on 19 November, 2025.

Github link

Release Notes:

OVN v25.09.1 - 18 Nov 2025
--------------------------
   - Bug fixes
   - Added disable_garp_rarp option to logical_router table in order to disable
     GARP/RARP announcements by all the peer ports of this logical router.
   - Add ovn-nbctl lsp-add-router-port which will create router port on
     specified LS.
   - Add ovn-nbctl lsp-add-localnet-port which will create localnet port on
     specified LS.
   - Dynamic Routing:
     * Add the option "dynamic-routing-vrf-id" to Logical Routers which allows
       CMS to specify the Linux routing table id for a given vrf.

Changelog

OVN 25.03

OVN 25.03 was initially released on 7 March, 2025. This version of OVN is currently supported for all bug fixes. Support for this version will end on 7 March, 2026.

v25.03.2

v25.03.2 was released on 19 November, 2025.

Github link

Release Notes:

OVN v25.03.2 - 18 Nov 2025
--------------------------
   - Bug fixes
   - Dynamic Routing:
     * Add the option "dynamic-routing-redistribute-local-only" to Logical
       Routers and Logical Router Ports which refines the way in which
       chassis-specific Advertised_Routes (e.g., for NAT and LB IPs) are
       advertised.
     * Add the option "dynamic-routing-vrf-id" to Logical Routers which allows
       CMS to specify the Linux routing table id for a given vrf.
   - Add ovn-nbctl lsp-add-router-port which will create router port on
     specified LS.
   - Add ovn-nbctl lsp-add-localnet-port which will create localnet port on
     specified LS.

Changelog

OVN 24.03

OVN 24.03 was initially released on 1 March, 2024. This version of OVN is currently supported for all bug fixes. This version will enter critical fix mode on 1 March, 2026. Support for this version will end on 1 March, 2027.

v24.03.7

v24.03.7 was released on 19 November, 2025.

Github link

Release Notes:

OVN v24.03.7 - 18 Nov 2025
--------------------------
  - Bug fixes
  - Add ovn-nbctl lsp-add-router-port which will create router port on
    specified LS.
  - Add ovn-nbctl lsp-add-localnet-port which will create localnet port on
    specified LS.

Changelog

item.title: All Releases
item.description:
Supported Releases

The following OVN release series are still receiving upstream support.

OVN 25.09

For more details, see 25.09

OVN 25.03

For more details, see 25.03

OVN 24.03

For more details, see 24.03

No Longer Supported Releases

The following OVN release series are no longer supported. This means that they will not receive any future bug fixes, including critical or security fixes. It is not recommended to use these unless you absolutely must. Use these at your own risk.
